snippet: President Donald Trump, his administration under siege for contacts with Russian officials, is calling for "an immediate investigation" into Senate Minority Leader Charles Schumer's own ties to Russian President Vladimir Putin....

headline.main: Before His Arrest in Threats to Jewish Groups, Suspect Fumed at Racism
headline.print_headline: Before His Arrest in Threats to Jewish Groups, Suspect Fumed at Racism

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump, his administration under siege for contacts with Russian officials, is calling for "an immediate investigation" into Senate Minority Leader Charles Schumer's own ties to Russian President Vladimir Putin.
